info.title: FullContact Name API
info.description: The Name Normalization method takes quasi-structured name data provided as a string and outputs the data in a structured manner. It also returns a likelihood based only on the order of the given name and family name as seen in the US population.

get.description: The Name Normalization method takes quasi-structured name data provided as a string and outputs the data in a structured manner. It also returns a likelihood based only on the order of the given name and family name as seen in the US population.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The q parameter allows you to pass a quasi-structured full name string which can include standard prefix, first name, nickname, middle name, last name and suffix.
